title: Meister Eckhart
summary: Eckhart von Hochheim OP (c. 1260 – c. 1328),[1] commonly known as Meister Eckhart[lower-alpha 1] or Eckehart, was a German Catholic theologian, philosopher and mystic, born near Gotha in the Landgraviate of Thuringia (now central Germany) in the Holy Roman Empire.[lower-alpha 2]
